nodes.bodyText: Do these reference name need to be as unique as possible? If so, we might want to add synopsys or something to the name as well so that there are no conflicts.
Well yes, but actually no. This is a risk we run, but the reference name is just the context plus a dot prefixed to the name of the field without spaces.
@jamesrichard91 What are your thoughts? These are user-visible fields, so it will potentially make issues more verbose, but that could be a good thing so that customers aren't confused.
Should we just remove the private method and put the contents in the public one?
